pullrequest.title: Slimmed down the Plugin pull request (no more template specializations)

content.raw:
It seems that it might be an intentional warning emitted by clang to try to reduce some kind of ambiguities that may arise from initializer-list construction. To be perfectly honest, initializer-lists are one of the few things from C++ whose syntax and usage patterns I find perplexing.

I think the clang warning is probably a fair one. This change doesn't seem harmful, so we may as well keep it.
content.html:
It seems that it might be an intentional warning emitted by clang to try to reduce some kind of ambiguities that may arise from initializer-list construction. To be perfectly honest, initializer-lists are one of the few things from C++ whose syntax and usage patterns I find perplexing.

I think the clang warning is probably a fair one. This change doesn't seem harmful, so we may as well keep it.
